\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 4900}

\subsection*{Opium Lettuce Zonker}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Idiot!}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 1.5 g & oral & Lactuca - L. virosa & tea\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 85.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
My Dr wouldn't give me a sedative \& I decided to try Aromatherapy \& medicinal herbs. I got this lettuce, a herbal sedative, from Culpeppers in England.



I brewed 1.5g in a cup for 15min \& then drank. I'd read a herbalist book saying overdose causes stupor, depressed respiration, coma \& death\ldots .so when I felt zonked so quickly \& strongly I assumed the worst, and spent the next hour staving off a huge panic attack by watching WWF wrestling (relaxing TV??!!). I'm still alive but next time, if there is one, I'll take a teaspoon of tea instead of a cup as my dosage level!!

\end{document}
